basicInfo.notes: Founded 2017 by Arto Minasyan (also co-founder of Krisp). Headquartered in Delaware with engineering in Yerevan, Armenia. AI-powered WordPress platform using GPT-4, Llama 2, Stable Diffusion. Hosted on Google Cloud with 275 data centers. 1.5M+ sites generated. 20,000+ paying customers. Origins from 2011 WordPress plugin company (Web-Dorado) with 1M users.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: NO REFUNDS - 7-day free trial instead of money-back guarantee

policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Excessive resource usage beyond plan limits
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: AI Personal $10/mo (1 site, 25K visits, 10GB SSD); AI Premium $24/mo (3 sites, 100K visits, 15GB); AI Ultimate higher; Agency plans $60+/mo; Visit overages $2/10K extra; Storage overages $2/5GB; Backup storage overages $2/20GB; No email hosting; 14-day free trial; NO REFUNDS; Annual saves 50%; Cloudflare Enterprise CDN included

contentRestrictions.contentNotes: WordPress-only hosting; AI website builder focus

editorial.knownIssues: No refund policy; Visit-based limits can be confusing; Support quality inconsistent per reviews; PHP upgrade compatibility issues reported; Some templated support responses; No phone support; No Redis caching; Storage overages add up
editorial.bestFor: AI-powered website creation; Small businesses wanting quick WordPress sites; Users needing PageSpeed optimization; Agencies managing multiple sites; Bloggers and content creators; Users wanting Google Cloud infrastructure
editorial.avoidIf: Need refund guarantee; Running high-traffic sites (visit limits); Need phone support; Want Redis caching; Concerned about no-refund policy; Need extensive customization beyond AI builder
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: AI-powered differentiation; Trustpilot 4.6 (2,257 reviews) good; G2 4.3; Google Cloud 275 data centers; 90+ PageSpeed scores; Competes with Elementor Hosting, SiteGround; AI website builder unique selling point; No refunds - 7-day trial only

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: AI-powered WordPress site builder with GPT-4 integration and Google Cloud infrastructure across 275 data centers
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Small business owner or blogger wanting to quickly create an AI-generated WordPress site with good PageSpeed scores

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: 10Web is good for AI-powered WordPress with Trustpilot 4.6 (2,257 reviews) and G2 4.3. Uses Google Cloud with 275 data centers. AI website builder is unique feature.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: 10Web is an independent VC-backed company founded in 2017 by Arto Minasyan (also co-founder of Krisp). Headquartered in Delaware, USA.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: AI Personal $10/mo (1 site). AI Premium $15/mo. AI Ultimate $23/mo (2 sites). Agency plans $25-140/mo. 7-day free trial. Annual saves 50%.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Very beginner-friendly with AI website builder that creates sites in minutes. 24/7 live chat support. 7-day free trial to test.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: No, 10Web does not include email hosting. Recommends Zoho or Google Workspace.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, 10Web is WordPress-only with AI-powered site builder, managed hosting, and automatic updates.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: 10Web guarantees 99.9% uptime powered by Google Cloud infrastructure.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, but NO REFUNDS. 7-day free trial available to test before committing.
